plugin.name: debugutilsbad
plugin.description: Collection of elements that may or may not be useful for debugging

element.name: fpsdisplaysink
element.longname: Measure and show framerate on videosink
element.description: Shows the current frame-rate and drop-rate of the videosink as overlay or text on stdout
element.author: Zeeshan Ali <zeeshan.ali@nokia.com>, Stefan Kost <stefan.kost@nokia.com>
